definition: air conditioning/air conditioner (including units that have a heating mode)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: The paper compares the economical efficiency of the VRV heat pump air condition system to the traditional heating systems.
sentences.chinese: 对VRV热泵空调系统采暖的经济性进行了分析比较。

sentences.english: The research indicates that chilled water thermal storage system has remarkable economic efficiency and social efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明水蓄冷空调具有显著的经济效益和社会效益。

sentences.english: The radiant ceiling cooling is a new technology with higher comfortable degree in the air-conditioning field.
sentences.chinese: 楼板辐射供冷是一种舒适度很高的新型空调技术。

sentences.english: Are air conditioning intakes which may permit the entry of cargo vapours closed?
sentences.chinese: 有可能吸入货物蒸汽的空调系统进气口是否已关闭？

sentences.english: They are air-conditioned with a private bath.
sentences.chinese: 房间是空调的，有独用浴室。

sentences.english: These air conditioners run away with a lot of electricity.
We're going to equip the room with air-conditioning.
sentences.chinese: 我们打算给这个房间装上空调。

sentences.english: A powerful launching campaign resulted in the large sales of the new type of air-conditioner.
sentences.chinese: 强有力投放市场活动使该款新空调的销售额大增。

sentences.english: Used as the heater for compressors of refrigerators, freezers and air conditioners.
sentences.chinese: 冰箱，冷柜，空调等制冷压缩机加热。

sentences.english: Guest rooms at the Hôtel Restaurant La Crémaillère are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi connection.
sentences.chinese: 每间客房都配有空调，提供平面电视和无线网络连接。

sentences.english: Use earplugs to eliminate noise, an eyeshade to kill the light, and turn the air-conditioning valve on high.
sentences.chinese: 用耳塞降低噪音，用眼罩来遮光，把空调风调大点。

sentences.english: Please be informed that Property Management Company is conducting continuously HVAC conversion works to CCP.
sentences.chinese: 物业公司正在陆续对园区各楼进行空调转换工作。

sentences.english: Dicussion of Inverter Controlled Air-Conditioner Test Method.
sentences.chinese: 变频空调器检测方法的探讨。

sentences.english: Air-conditioner worked really well, and you are able to set your own temps.
sentences.chinese: 空调倒是很不错，可以任意根据需要调节温度。

sentences.english: Apartments include free internet access and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.
sentences.chinese: 每间空调客房都配备了卫星电视和免费无线网络连接。
